mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notification WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification (receiver_id, content, url, related_id, type, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{receiverId}, #{content}, #{url}, #{relatedId}, #{type}, #{isRead}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE notification SET is_read = #{isRead}, url = #{url}, related_id = #{relatedId}, content = #{content}, type = #{type} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE notification SET is_read = true WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND is_read = false
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notification WHERE is_read = true AND created_at < #{before}
